content.title: Bicycle Scheme (HBOCWWB)
content.department: Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department Haryana
content.details: The scheme “Bicycle Scheme (HBOCWWB)” was launched by the Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department Haryana. Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹3,000/- will be given to registered construction workers for the purchase of a bicycle once in 3 years. The benefits of the scheme will be given only to registered workers who have 1 year of continuous membership of the welfare board.
benefits: The registered worker will be provided ₹3000/- for the purchase of the bicycle.
eligibility: The worker should be registered under Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB).
The registered worker should have a minimum of one-year regular membership.
The worker may avail of the benefits only once in 3 years.
documents_required: Identity proof i.e. Aadhaar Card, Voter Card
An undertaking for purchase of cycle giving price, trademark, source, and date.

faqs.question: What is the “Bicycle Scheme (HBOCWWB)” scheme?
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹3,000/- will be given to registered construction workers for the purchase of a bicycle once in 3 years.

faqs.question: Which department has launched this scheme?
faqs.answer: Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department Haryana.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to get the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The construction worker who is registered under the Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB) and has a minimum of one-year regular membership is eligible to apply under the scheme.

faqs.question: Can a general category worker be eligible to apply under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme is for all categories of workers.

faqs.question: Is this scheme only for a resident of Haryana State?
faqs.answer: Yes, the applicant should be a permanent resident/domicile of Haryana State.

faqs.question: What is the benefit of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The registered worker will be provided ₹3000/- for the purchase of the bicycle.

faqs.question: In how many years can the worker avail the benefit of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The worker may avail of the benefits only once in 3 years.

faqs.question: Is the worker required to submit an undertaking?
faqs.answer: Yes, the beneficiary needs to submit an undertaking for the purchase of the bicycle giving the price, trademark, source, and date.

faqs.question: How can a construction worker get registered under HBOCWWB?
faqs.answer: For registration, the construction worker should visit the Official Website of the Labour Department Haryana.

faqs.question: Is there any registration fee needed while registering under HBOCWWB?
faqs.answer: Yes, the first-time registration charges are ₹25/- and the registration fees vary according to the renewal time period.

faqs.question: How can a worker apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The eligible worker may apply online mode.

faqs.question: How can a construction worker apply online under the scheme?
faqs.answer: For online application, the construction worker should visit the Official Portal -Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.
